name: ThirdPerson
author: Davi & NotAKidoS
description: Allows you to go into third person view by pressing Ctrl + T to toggle and Ctrl + Y to cycle modes.
changelog:
- Fixed an issue where VR Switching without using ThirdPerson prior would incorrectly set the Desktop camera culling mask to 0
- Fixed an NRE when checking CVRWorld zoom rule when no CVRWorld instance was found
- Prevented head hiding from persisting into third person while Avatar Overrender Ui is enabled
